column5: Anyone know where i can find a live link to listen to that guy on channel 16 for the annoying marine reports. God it sucks sometimes when you have to listen to the french version first, it sounds like it's never ending.

http://www.nws.noaa.gov/om/marine/gtlakes.htm  Just print it and go if you get the mayfor codes for where you are fishing and you decode them it is  good for 36 hrs dont forget to keep your eyes open!
